items.sentence: Tom and Mary watched a documentary about squirrels.
Tom and Mary went horseback riding along the beach.
Tom and Mary were sitting on a bench near the pond.
Tom and Mary were sitting on the sofa, watching TV.
Tom and his friends are playing soccer in the park.
I really don\'t want to go out on a date with Mary.
I really don\'t want to sit in the back of the bus.
I remember his face but I can\'t remember his name.
Tom and Mary suddenly realized they weren\'t alone.
Tom broke into Mary\'s house and stole her jewelry.
